source.51797f0e:
# Can We Correlate weather conditions and Corona virus Spread through Data?

Can We Correlate weather conditions and Corona virus Spread through Data?Can We confirm this hypothesis that spread of corona virus is slow down by warm weather.

We are trying to answers this question.

To do this work, I choose first cities in different country and different continent. We have

> 1- Milano (Italy-Europe)

> 2- New York City (USA-North America)

> 3  Cairo (Egypt-Africa)

> 4- Tehran (Iran-moyen-orient)

> 5- Tokyo City (Japan-Asie)

The weather data for these countries, I take from website: https://www.wunderground.com/
